name: Sightseer Walkabout
description:
NOT FULL GAME NOR DEMO, ITS A WALKING SIM

Sightseer is a game that’s in the making of. It’s set around 1515 in a fantasy city. You as the player arrive at Hirune with your horse and cart.  You find Ari, your main companion. The backstory of this friendship is how you wrote to each other about business opportunities, you find her and now find a home in which to live in, bought by Anders, the village drunkard. That’s just a quick summary of mission 0. There’s an arena mode in the making in which you fight waves of enemies with only a sword and maybe shield. Releasing sometime in late 2021 (demo), full game release date is unknown but hopefully soon.
